name: Citlali
title: "Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali
desc: The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Citlali to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Dawnfrost Darkstar
skills.desc:
Deals ? ?.
Enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 1 Nightsoul point, and creates 1 point of Opal Shield and Itzpapa. (This skill cannot be used after the character enters Nightsoul's Blessing)

skills.name: Edict of Entwined Splendor
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, and, if possible, gains 2 Nightsoul points.

skills.name: Songs of Profound Mystery
skills.desc: After you Select or deal DMG with an Elemental Reaction: If possible, gain 1 Nightsoul point. (Once per Round)
